profile.description: Hello, I am Federico, a full-stack developer with Python. I am passionate about technology and computing, and I am always looking for new challenges. I graduated in 2023 from the Full Stack Development with Python course of the Codo a Codo 4.0 program, where I will learn to create websites and applications from scratch, using the best practices and tools in the sector. I am a reliable and proactive professional, with a passion for continuous learning. I consider myself self-taught and I am always willing to explore new technologies and solutions.

proyectos.proyecto2: These are some of my projects:
proyectos.sportspalooza: It is an exciting platform that combines sports predictions (prode) with the ability to create matches for tournaments in the office.
proyectos.petway: We are an online pet products store that has been working for more than 20 years to offer the best service and care for them.
proyectos.quimicaInorganica: Descriptive chemistry of elements is often seen as a collection of unrelated facts with very few fundamental principles.
proyectos.grabadora: With this recorder you can select which part of your screen to record in the simplest and most efficient way, with just the press of a button.
proyectos.blackJack: Blackjack is a card game in which the objective is to make a hand worth more points than the dealer's hand, without going over 21.

habilidades.habilidad: These are some of the technologies and languages I master and use to create quality websites and web applications
